items.sentence: Everybody is hoping that nothing bad will happen.
I understand you\'re a personal friend of Tom\'s.
The last time I saw Tom he didn\'t look too well.
It\'s the first time that that has ever happened.
I asked for the key and went upstairs to my room.
I haven\'t seen my ex-wife since we got divorced.
That\'s why we\'re still doing what we\'re doing.
I thought you were a better chess player than me.
I wish I could get Tom to show me how to do that.
Did Tom say he that thought he needed to do that?
